function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Fueling populism and nationalism via patriotism","Impact":"Undermining international solidarity","Mitigation":"Encouraging collaboration and communication between nations","Technologies":"Diplomacy and international relations initiatives","People":"Global leaders, policymakers, and citizens","Owner":"World leaders, international organizations, and diplomatic corps"},{"Description":"Allocation of relief funds to projects not directly related to the epidemic","Impact":"Misallocation of resources and hindered pandemic response","Mitigation":"Transparency and accountability in fund allocation","Technologies":"Financial auditing and oversight mechanisms","People":"Government officials and policymakers","Owner":"Financial regulators and oversight bodies"},{"Description":"Long-lasting economic impacts on developing nations","Impact":"Increased poverty, limited access to health care, and food shortages","Mitigation":"International aid, subsidies, and economic support","Technologies":"Development finance and aid distribution systems","People":"Citizens of developing nations","Owner":"International aid organizations and donor nations"}]}
